entry.title: Field no longer exists in reuse active area/ Field created in reuse active area
entry.content:
While adding values in the 'Incompatible or Required Parts or Application' field and updating the material, I receive an error message after saving, as shown in the screenshot."

I added these fields in the Manage Material Governance app using data model extension and UI extension in MDG."

entry.title: Change documents of Active Area in "Manage Material" app
entry.content:
Hi guys,

if you go to the "Manage Material" app and select a material you can go to the change documents of this material.

But this will only show the changes done via a CR.

If you go to "Display Change Documents" app you are able to include the change documents of active area.

Is it possible to include the change documents of active area in the "Manage Material" app?

Regards

entry.title: FIORI Tiles Language Translation
entry.content:
Hi Team,

I am able to maintain Translation for Space, Page, Section and Tile using se63. But Tile translation is not working for Custom Tile.

SE63 -> Translation -> ABAP Objects -> Transport Object

R3TR UIAD App_descriptor_ID

Maintained in the below Translation, it's not reflecting in the Fiori screen. cleared Global, Client Cache still no use. Please let us know is it the right process.

Thanks & Regards,

Prasad.

entry.title: Mass Processing Error 'Changing worklist content failed'
entry.content:
Hi Experts,

I am trying to upload an XLSX file and do a mass processing via "Start Mass Processing - Business Partner" which follows the proper file template. After uploding the file when I am clicking on SAVE button, I am getting the following error(screenshot attached also).

Error : Changing worklist content failed

I found a similar issue on the SAP community (https://community.sap.com/t5/technology-q-a/sap-mdg-changing-worklist-content-failed-mass-processing/qaq-p/13866973) and implemented the OSS note 3098273 mentioned there, but still no luck.

It would be great if anyone of you can shed some light on it.

Thanks, T

entry.title: Changed MDG data entries are not getting captured into this table mdgv_cp_bo_sys
entry.content:
Hello Team,

Entries are not saved for BP changes into table mdgv_cp_bo_sys, previously prior to system RISE migration we did not face this issue. Wondering ever anyone faced this issue?

configurations on DRFIMG and MDGIMG were not changed during the issue period of time.

entry.title: How to load MDC Source tables?
entry.content:
Hello Experts,

I have a question on dataload using MDG Consolidation process. We have multiple ECC source systems from where we need to load vendor data(total 300K from all ECC source systems) into MDG Hub on S/4 HANA. I am trying to understand what would be the best practice to load the SRC tables(LFA1_SRC, BUT000_SRC etc etc) so that I can trigger the Consolidation process from MDG after SRC tables are populated from the source systems…should we use an ETL tool like SAP DS or this OSS note abap program (https://launchpad.support.sap.com/#/notes/2233142) to load those SRC tables? 

I need an urgent help in this regard. Thanks in advance for your advice.

entry.title: label data view in SAP MDG Material.
entry.content:
Hi

Can anyone help me with information about how to add Label data view in SAP MDG Material?

This view is available in S4 side as standard. Do we need to do data model extension?

entry.title: Master Data Integration - Cloud Foundry Runtime / Spaces - yes or no
entry.content:
Hi all,

I'm receiving mixed signals here:

  • In SAP Master Data Integration, the "vanilla" documentation says, to create applications / service instances per app without a space and using runtime "other"
  • A scenario specific help, e.g. for Digital Manufacturing however states to use a space
  • I saw that Business Process Orchestrations needs spaces

Do you / shall I use spaces? If I later need to onboard BPO, can I still do this even if I deployed the instances without space at first?

Thanks and cheers

Jens

entry.title: Post Upgrade (RISE) - MDG Supplier Validation Error Message "Enter incoterm location 1"
entry.content:
Good day,

Firstly thank you for your help. 

We have recently upgraded to Rise with our S/4HANA system and in turn we are encountering some new and interesting features/events when working within MDG. when we maintain our Vendor/Supplier we now receive the following validation error message: "Enter incoterm location 1". 

Previously we did not encounter this and from Inspection I can see this is error message V2860  is being raised in a SAP standard program.

My question is why is this present now? and can we work around this?

Thanks again for the help

entry.title: MDG Free tier - Workflow or email not generated after BP creation
entry.content:
Hi all, I have the free-tie MDG subscription. I have tried out the functionality to create BPs and it works well. The only thing that is not working is when I create the BP - I would expect to recieive something in the inbox to either approve or reject the created BP. When I tried creating I created the BP however there was no workflow generated to the inbox to either approve or reject. 

What could be the issue here? Is there some added configuration that needs to be done or is the workflow steps not generated when you only have free-tier MDG? I have run the booster set-up for the MDG to work in a subaccout.

entry.title: What are the required steps to enable replication from SAP S/4HANA On-Premise to SAP MDG, cloud
entry.content:
Hello,

I would like to replicate Business Partners from SAP S/4HANA On-Premise to SAP MDG, cloud edition.

According to the Deep-Dive: SAP Master Data Governance, cloud edition documentation, this should be possible. However, the documentation only describes the configuration steps for SAP S/4HANA Cloud → MDG Cloud (via Communication Arrangements) Create Communication Arrangement | SAP Help Portal.

So my question is: : What are the required steps to enable replication from SAP S/4HANA On-Premise to SAP MDG, cloud edition?

entry.title: Missing a communication scenario for configuring MDG
entry.content:
Hi, 

I am trying to set up the communication arrangement for MDG to work. When I follow the set-up guide I can not find the communication scenario that SAP wants me to use when setting up the communication arrangement. I do not understand why SAP_COM_0878 is not selectable as an option in the list when selecting the scenario. What do I need to do to be able to choose SAP_COM_0878?

entry.title: MDG upgrade from 1909 to MDG 2023 - UIBB Customizations overwritten
entry.content:
Hello All, 

After upgrading our MDG system from 1909 to 2023, we have observed the following issues:
• All UIBBs and fields are now visible, including those that were previously hidden.
• Our customized fields and configurations seem to be overwritten by the standard SAP delivery.
• The customizations still exist in the system, but instead of showing our configured fields, the standard fields are now appearing.

Question:
Post-upgrade, will all customizations made on top of standard configurations (UIBBs, hidden fields, etc.) be overwritten in 2023?
What is the recommended approach to preserve or reapply these customizations after an upgrade?

Thanks in advance for your insights.

entry.title: Unable to extend Bapi Structure due to error 'creating new field is not possible'
entry.content:
Requirement: Configure a Z-field called “Z_INSTITUTE” with a length of 160 characters in the BUT0ID table. This includes extending the data model, adding it to the UI, and including this field for mass processing.
Issue: While appending BAPI structure getting below error as enhancement category is "Append is restricted ", due to this error i am not able to proceed in SMT mapping and UI configs.

 

Could you please help me if you have any idea to handle this scenario?
Thank you in advance!

class CL_USMD_GOV_API & method IF_USMD_GOV_API_TRANS~SAVE taking huge time to save. Debugger keeps on buffering and eventually gets timed out. Anyone knows the possible reasons for it to take so much time. 

SAP Master Data Governance SAP Data Quality Management for SAP NetWeaver MDM

entry.title: creating workflow CR to block/unblock employee in SAP MDG
entry.content:
Hi 

need help in creating workflow CR. i never worked on such requirement before and don't know either how to do and you such help in youtube and google for this requirement.
please guide me step by step what i have to do.


add the ability to block / unblock employee vendors through workflow. This needs to happen at general and company code level.

 

Create a new Workflow CR to Block/Unblock the Employee record.

Vendor type: Employee

Auth group: EMPL

 

Security: Security authorization to restrict based on the Geo’s.

 

Below mentioned are the fields that should be allowed to be modified:

No.

SAP Field

Description

1

BUT000- XDELE

Archiving Flag

2

BUT000- XBLCK

Central Block

3

LFA1- LOEVM

Deletion Flag

4

LFA1- SPERR

Posting Block

5

LFA1- SPERM

Purch. block

6

LFB1- SPERR

Co.code post.block

7

LFB1- LOEVM

Co.Cde Deletion Flag

8

LFB1- ZAHLS

Payment Block

entry.title: Manage Business Partner-Edit Relationship but not General Data
entry.content:
Hi, 
I have a scenario (in SAP GTS e4H) where the business should be allowed to edit 'Relationships' of a Business Partner but not to change the 'General Data', as the  Business partners are coming from MDG (SAP System) and the persons are created locally in GTS.
Following is needed:
Create and edit person (Role BUP001) -> allowed
Assign contact person to a business partner (Organization)-> 'Relationships -> allowed
Change Business Partners (Organization) -> 'General Data' -> Not allowed
Would it help to restrict Change authorization to role 'BUP001' -> Authorization Object 'B_BUPA_RLT' -> ACTVT Change and RLTYP = 'BUP0001'
Thanks

entry.title: BP Legal Form changes not updating KNA1-GFORM
entry.content:
We are facing an issue in our MDG on S/4HANA landscape related to BP → Customer (CVI) synchronization.

  • When a Business Partner is created with a Legal Form (Legal Status), the value is correctly updated into KNA1-GFORM during the initial creation.

  • However, when we later update the Legal Form in BP (through MDG Change Request), the change is not reflected in KNA1-GFORM after activation.

  • CVI customizing and mapping (Legal Status ↔ Legal Form) is already in place and checked.

  • Other field updates (e.g., name, address) are working fine and replicating properly.

  • There are no errors in activation or replication logs  the update just doesn’t reach KNA1.

Any guidance, experience, or reference to OSS notes would be very helpful.
